entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 18. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Saturday 28 May 2016
